markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pride Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2321) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies. You can use lesser cover from your allies to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62).
name: Pride Hunter
